bugs.cf_release_notes: This enhancement update adds the redhat-certification-cloud package to Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 and Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. As a result, Red Hat Certified Cloud and Service Provider (CCSP) program partners can use redhat-certification-cloud (and its dependencies) via the Red Hat Certification application (the redhat-certification package) to run certification tests on a Cloud Application Image and generate test logs and other results. These can then be submitted to Red Hat certification services for validation.
bugs.summary: [New Package] As a Cloud and Service Provider I want to certify my cloud images on the RHEL platform using Unified Red Hat Certification experience
